00005 const Ogre::String CaelumSystem::SKY_DOME_MATERIAL_NAME = "CaelumSkyDomeMaterial";

00008 CaelumSystem::CaelumSystem (Ogre::Root *root, Ogre::SceneManager *sceneMgr) {
00009   LOG ("Initialising Caelum system...");
00010   mOgreRoot = root;
00011   mSceneMgr = sceneMgr;
00012 
00013   mOgreRoot->addFrameListener (this);
00014 
00015   createSkyDomeMaterial ();
00016   createStarfieldMaterial ();
00017 
00018   mUpdateRate = 0;
00019   mTimeSinceLastUpdate = 0;
00020 
00021   mTotalDayTime = 24 * 59 * 56;
00022   mTimeScale = 1.0f;
00023   mLocalTime = 0.0f;
00024 
00025   mManageFog = false;
00026 
00027   mSun = new Sun (sceneMgr);
00028 
00029   mStarfield = 0;
00030 
00031   LOG ("DONE");
00032 }

00034 CaelumSystem::~CaelumSystem () {
00035   LOG ("Shutting down Caelum system...");
00036   // Unregister all the listeners
00037   mListeners.clear ();
00038 
00039   // Remove all the sky domes
00040   std::set<SkyDome *>::iterator sdIt, sdIend = mSkyDomes.end ();
00041   for (sdIt = mSkyDomes.begin (); sdIt != sdIend; ++sdIt) {
00042     delete *sdIt;
00043   }
00044   mSkyDomes.clear ();
00045 
00046   destroyStarfield ();
00047 
00048   delete mSun;
00049   mSun = 0;
00050 
00051   mOgreRoot->removeFrameListener (this);
00052   LOG ("DONE");
00053 }

00063 void CaelumSystem::registerAllToTarget (Ogre::RenderTarget *target) {
00064   std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *> *list = collectAllRenderTargetListeners ();
00065 
00066   std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *>::iterator it, iend = list->end ();
00067   for (it = list->begin (); it != iend; ++it) {
00068     target->addListener (*it);
00069   }
00070 
00071   delete list;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CaelumSystem::unregisterAllFromTarget (Ogre::RenderTarget *target) {
00075   std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *> *list = collectAllRenderTargetListeners ();
00076 
00077   std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *>::iterator it, iend = list->end ();
00078   for (it = list->begin (); it != iend; ++it) {
00079     target->removeListener (*it);
00080   }
00081 
00082   delete list;
00083 }

00085 void CaelumSystem::setUpdateRate (float rate) {
00086   if (rate < 0)
00087     rate = 0;
00088 
00089   mUpdateRate = rate;
00090 
00091   // Force an update when changing this
00092   mTimeSinceLastUpdate = mUpdateRate + 1;
00093 }

00118 void CaelumSystem::setTotalDayTime (const float time) {
00119   mTotalDayTime = time;
00120 
00121   if (mTotalDayTime <= 0)
00122     mTotalDayTime = 24 * 60 * 60 - 4;
00123 
00124   // Force an update when changing this
00125   mTimeSinceLastUpdate = mUpdateRate + 1;
00126 }

00132 void CaelumSystem::setSunDirection (Ogre::Vector3 dir) {
00133   if (!mSkyDomeMaterial.isNull ()) {
00134     if (mOgreRoot->getRenderSystem ()->getCapabilities ()->hasCapability (Ogre::RSC_VERTEX_PROGRAM)) {
00135       mSkyDomeMaterial->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0)->getVertexProgramParameters ()->setNamedConstant ("sunDirection", dir);
00136     }
00137   }
00138 }
00139 
00140 bool CaelumSystem::frameStarted (const Ogre::FrameEvent &e) {
00141   // Call every listener before doing anything
00142   if (!fireStartedEvent (e))
00143     return false;
00144 
00145   mLocalTime += e.timeSinceLastFrame * mTimeScale;
00146   if (mLocalTime > mTotalDayTime) {
00147     clampLocalTime ();
00148   }
00149 
00150   // Update only if required
00151   mTimeSinceLastUpdate += (e.timeSinceLastFrame * Ogre::Math::Abs (mTimeScale)) / mTotalDayTime;
00152   if (mTimeSinceLastUpdate > mUpdateRate) {
00153     // Do it this way so we don't lose any seconds and the updates doesn't queue
00154     if (mUpdateRate != 0)
00155       mTimeSinceLastUpdate -= mUpdateRate * Ogre::Math::Floor (mTimeSinceLastUpdate / mUpdateRate);
00156     else
00157       mTimeSinceLastUpdate = 0;
00158 
00159     if (mSun) {
00160       mSun->update (mLocalTime / mTotalDayTime);
00161     }
00162 
00163     if (mStarfield) {
00164       mStarfield->update (mLocalTime / mTotalDayTime);
00165     }
00166 
00167     updateSkyDomeMaterialTime ();
00168 
00169     if (!mSkyDomeMaterial.isNull ()) {
00170       if (mOgreRoot->getRenderSystem ()->getCapabilities ()->hasCapability (Ogre::RSC_VERTEX_PROGRAM)) {
00171         mSkyDomeMaterial->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0)->getVertexProgramParameters ()->setNamedConstant ("sunDirection", mSun->getSunDirection ());
00172       }
00173     }
00174 
00175     if (mManageFog) {
00176       // TODO: Fog stuff here!!!
00177       if (mSkyColourModel) {
00178         mSceneMgr->setFog (Ogre::FOG_EXP2,
00179                           mSkyColourModel->getFogColour (mLocalTime / mTotalDayTime) * 0.7,
00180                           mSkyColourModel->getFogDensity (mLocalTime / mTotalDayTime));
00181       }
00182     }
00183   }
00184 
00185   mSun->setSunColour (mSceneMgr->getFogColour ());
00186 
00187   return fireFinishedEvent (e);
00188 }

00190 SkyDome *CaelumSystem::createSkyDome () {
00191   SkyDome *temp = new SkyDome (mSceneMgr);
00192 
00193   mSkyDomes.insert (temp);
00194 
00195   return temp;
00196 }

00221 Starfield *CaelumSystem::createStarfield (const Ogre::String &mapName) {
00222   if (mStarfield)
00223     destroyStarfield ();
00224 
00225   mStarfield = new Starfield (mSceneMgr);
00226 
00227   // Update the starfield material
00228   mStarfieldMaterial->getBestTechnique ()->getPass (0)->getTextureUnitState (0)->setTextureName (mapName);
00229 
00230   return mStarfield;
00231 }

00237 void CaelumSystem::destroyStarfield () {

00239     delete mStarfield;
00240     mStarfield = 0;
00241   }

00244 bool CaelumSystem::fireStartedEvent (const Ogre::FrameEvent &e) {
00245   std::set<CaelumListener *>::iterator it, iend = mListeners.end ();
00246   bool flag = true;
00247 
00248   it = mListeners.begin ();
00249 
00250   while (it != iend && flag) {
00251     flag &= (*it)->caelumStarted (e, this);
00252 
00253     ++it;
00254   }
00255 
00256   return flag;
00257 }
00258 
00259 bool CaelumSystem::fireFinishedEvent (const Ogre::FrameEvent &e) {
00260   std::set<CaelumListener *>::iterator it, iend = mListeners.end ();
00261   bool flag = true;
00262 
00263   it = mListeners.begin ();
00264 
00265   while (it != iend && flag) {
00266     flag &= (*it)->caelumFinished (e, this);
00267 
00268     ++it;
00269   }
00270 
00271   return flag;
00272 }

00274 std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *> *CaelumSystem::collectAllRenderTargetListeners () {
00275   std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *> *list = new std::set<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *>();
00276 
00277   // Insert all the domes
00278   std::set<SkyDome *>::iterator sdIt, sdIend = mSkyDomes.end ();
00279   for (sdIt = mSkyDomes.begin (); sdIt != sdIend; ++sdIt) {
00280     list->insert (*sdIt);
00281   }
00282 
00283   // Insert the sun
00284   if (mSun) {
00285     list->insert (static_cast<Ogre::RenderTargetListener *>(mSun));
00286   }
00287 
00288   // Insert the starfield
00289   if (mStarfield) {
00290     list->insert (mStarfield);
00291   }
00292 
00293   return list;
00294 }
00295 
00296 void CaelumSystem::clampLocalTime () {
00297   if (mLocalTime < 0) {
00298     int ratio = (int )(mTotalDayTime / -mLocalTime);
00299     mLocalTime += mTotalDayTime * ratio;
00300   }
00301   if (mLocalTime > mTotalDayTime) {
00302     int ratio = (int )(mTotalDayTime / mLocalTime);
00303     mLocalTime -= mTotalDayTime * ratio;
00304   }
00305 }

00307 void CaelumSystem::createSkyDomeMaterial () {
00308   Ogre::MaterialPtr mat;
00309 
00310   LOG ("Generating sky dome material...");
00311   if (!Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().resourceExists (SKY_DOME_MATERIAL_NAME)) {
00312     LOG ("\tMaterial not found; creating...");
00313     mat = static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().create (SKY_DOME_MATERIAL_NAME, "Caelum"));
00314     mat->setReceiveShadows (false);
00315     LOG ("\t\tMaterial [OK]");
00316     Ogre::Pass *pass = mat->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0);
00317     pass->setSceneBlending (Ogre::SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA);
00318     pass->setDepthCheckEnabled (false);
00319     pass->setDepthWriteEnabled (false);
00320     pass->setLightingEnabled (false);
00321     pass->setFog (true);
00322     // Bind the sky light absorption shader if capable to
00323     // TODO
00324     if (mOgreRoot->getRenderSystem ()->getCapabilities ()->hasCapability (Ogre::RSC_FRAGMENT_PROGRAM)) {
00325       Ogre::HighLevelGpuProgramPtr fp = Ogre::HighLevelGpuProgramManager::getSingleton().createProgram("SkyLightAbsorptionFP","Caelum","cg",Ogre::GPT_FRAGMENT_PROGRAM);
00326       fp->setSourceFile ("SkyLightAbsorption.cg");
00327       fp->setParameter ("entry_point", "main_fp");
00328       fp->setParameter ("profiles", "ps_2_0 arbfp1");
00329       pass->setFragmentProgram ("SkyLightAbsorptionFP");
00330       Ogre::GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr parameters = pass->getFragmentProgramParameters();
00331       parameters->setNamedConstant("offset", 0);
00332     }
00333     if (mOgreRoot->getRenderSystem ()->getCapabilities ()->hasCapability (Ogre::RSC_VERTEX_PROGRAM)) {
00334       Ogre::HighLevelGpuProgramPtr vp = Ogre::HighLevelGpuProgramManager::getSingleton().createProgram("SkyLightAbsorptionVP","Caelum","cg",Ogre::GPT_VERTEX_PROGRAM);
00335       vp->setSourceFile ("SkyLightAbsorption.cg");
00336       vp->setParameter ("entry_point", "main_vp");
00337       vp->setParameter ("profiles", "vs_2_0 arbvp1");
00338       pass->setVertexProgram ("SkyLightAbsorptionVP");
00339       Ogre::GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr parameters = pass->getVertexProgramParameters();
00340       parameters->setNamedAutoConstant("worldViewProj", Ogre::GpuProgramParameters::ACT_WORLDVIEWPROJ_MATRIX);
00341       parameters->setNamedConstant("sunDirection", Ogre::Vector3 (1, 0, 0));
00342     }
00343     LOG ("\t\tPass [OK]");
00344     Ogre::TextureUnitState *tus = pass->createTextureUnitState ();
00345     tus->setTextureAddressingMode (Ogre::TextureUnitState::TAM_WRAP, Ogre::TextureUnitState::TAM_CLAMP, Ogre::TextureUnitState::TAM_CLAMP);
00346     LOG ("\t\tTextureUnit [OK]");
00347     mat->load ();
00348     LOG ("\tDONE");
00349   }
00350   else {
00351     mat = static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().getByName (SKY_DOME_MATERIAL_NAME));
00352   }
00353   LOG ("DONE");
00354 
00355   mSkyDomeMaterial = mat;
00356 }

00358 void CaelumSystem::createStarfieldMaterial () {
00359   Ogre::MaterialPtr mat;
00360 
00361   LOG ("Generating starfield material...");
00362   if (!Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().resourceExists (STARFIELD_MATERIAL_NAME)) {
00363     LOG ("\tMaterial not found; creating...");
00364     mat = static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().create (STARFIELD_MATERIAL_NAME, "Caelum"));
00365     mat->setReceiveShadows (false);
00366     LOG ("\t\tMaterial [OK]");
00367     Ogre::Pass *pass = mat->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0);
00368     pass->setDepthCheckEnabled (false);
00369     pass->setDepthWriteEnabled (false);
00370     pass->setLightingEnabled (false);
00371     pass->setFog (true);
00372     LOG ("\t\tPass [OK]");
00373     Ogre::TextureUnitState *tus = pass->createTextureUnitState ();
00374     tus->setTextureAddressingMode (Ogre::TextureUnitState::TAM_WRAP, Ogre::TextureUnitState::TAM_WRAP, Ogre::TextureUnitState::TAM_WRAP);
00375     LOG ("\t\tTextureUnit [OK]");
00376     mat->load ();
00377     LOG ("\tDONE");
00378   }
00379   else {
00380     mat = static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().getByName (STARFIELD_MATERIAL_NAME));
00381   }
00382   LOG ("DONE");
00383 
00384   mStarfieldMaterial = mat;
00385 }
00386 
00387 void CaelumSystem::updateSkyDomeMaterialTime () {
00388   Ogre::TextureUnitState *tus = mSkyDomeMaterial->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0)->getTextureUnitState (0);
00389   tus->setTextureUScroll (mLocalTime / mTotalDayTime);
00390   if (mOgreRoot->getRenderSystem ()->getCapabilities ()->hasCapability (Ogre::RSC_FRAGMENT_PROGRAM)) {
00391     mSkyDomeMaterial->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0)->getFragmentProgramParameters ()->setNamedConstant ("offset", mLocalTime / mTotalDayTime);
00392   }
00393 }
